article.name: AIDA Orchestration Technical Preview
article.title: AIDA Orchestration Technical Preview
article.body:
KnowBe4’s Artificial Intelligence Defense Agents (AIDA) allow you to successfully manage human risk with the power of AI. With AIDA, you can significantly reduce your organization’s risk and demonstrate positive impacts on real-world user behavior. AIDA will continue to evolve over time, providing new ways to reach your goals.

The AIDA Orchestration technical preview is available to current AIDA customers. Diamond-level KSAT customers can opt in by navigating to the AIDA Technical Preview post in the KnowBe4 Community, and you can opt out at any time.

Opting in to the AIDA Orchestration Technical Preview

If you click the link in the announcement on your Dashboard or in the community post, a welcome page will display.

Click Opt In, and the AIDA Orchestration tab will display in the console. For more information, please see our AIDA Orchestration Guide.

Note: You will need to log in to view the AIDA Orchestration Guide.

Go to the Get Started with AIDA article to learn more about our other AIDA Agents: AIDA Phishing Templates, AIDA Training, AIDA Policy Quizzes, and AIDA Knowledge Refreshers.
